Hello,

Data loss.

I go to https://bugzilla.mozilla.org .
In the Quick Search field, I enter "plenty of space" without the quotes.
I click "Quick Search".
I get some results.
I click "Edit Search".
I get a search form, but my search terms are in no field. They have been lost. Too bad.

Please correct that.

Thanks,

Nicolas

comments.text:
Actually now I have found my search terms. They were not in the field Summary that appears at the top. They were hidden in Custom Search. I had not seen them because Custom Search was folded.

So either put the search terms in the field Summary that appears at the top, or unfold Custom Search.

Thanks,

Nicolas

(In reply to Nicolas Barbulesco from comment #1)
> So either put the search terms in the field Summary that appears at the top,
> or unfold Custom Search.

When you type "plenty of space" in the quick search box, you are not restricting the search to the summary field, so that's not the right place to put it back when editing the search. Once you opened the Custom Search once, your browser will remember it for you and you will see them immediately. So that's not a critical issue.
